name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 109
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Right Clicking & Saving. Don’t tell anybody but I just figured out you totally don’t even have to buy these NFT things, you can just right click and save the image and bam it’s yours!
